quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A wedding dress is both an intimate and personal for a woman - it must reflect the personality and style of the bride.
author: Carolina Herrera

quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: There's a big difference between falling in love with someone and falling in love with someone and getting married. Usually, after you get married, you fall in love with the person even more.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
author: Nick Cave

quote: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: A wedding, a great wedding, is just a blast. A celebration of romance and community and love... What is unfun about that? Nothing.
author: Ariel Levy

quote: I think everyone dreams of that nice romantic wedding.
author: Lance Bass

quote: We all have special numbers in our lives, and 4 is that for me. It's the day I was born. My mother's birthday, and a lot of my friends' birthdays, are on the fourth; April 4 is my wedding date.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: I'm getting married because I'm in love with a girl and want to spend my life with her. You can't live your life doing what other people want you to or you'll be miserable. At some point you just have to be yourself.
author: Dan Marino

quote: I remember when I was in school, they would ask, 'What are you going to be when you grow up?' and then you'd have to draw a picture of it. I drew a picture of myself as a bride.
author: Gwen Stefani

quote: I think a lot of people get so obsessed with the wedding and the expense of the wedding that they miss out on what the real purpose is. It's not about a production number, it's about a meaningful moment between two people that's witnessed by people that they actually really know and care about.
author: Jane Seymour

quote: Even if you believe a creator god invented the laws of physics, would you so insult him as to suggest that he might capriciously and arbitrarily violate them in order to walk on water, or turn water into wine as a cheap party trick at a wedding?
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I want to be a simple bride when I get married. I want a beach wedding where I am running around on the sand in a white dress.
author: Sonakshi Sinha

quote: 'Endless Love' is such a perfect love song for a wedding or for a Valentine, because that is the committed kind of endless love. All the lyrics are perfect.
author: Delilah

quote: There's a higher form of happiness in commitment. I'm counting on it.
author: Claire Forlani

quote: My mom used to make my costumes when I was little; she sews a lot. One year, I was a bride and I had a big wedding dress and a bouquet. Another year I was a medieval princess with a long teal dress and a veil. It was a little extravagant, but it was cute!
author: Sasha Pieterse

quote: One tradition I have with my friends is that when one of us gets married, we have a ton of fragrance oils and pretty bottles at the bachelorette party. Everyone puts a drop or two in a bottle for the bride and makes a wish, and the bride wears our creation on her wedding day.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: A young bride is like a plucked flower; but a guilty wife is like a flower that had been walked over.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: A man's got two shots for jewelry: a wedding ring and a watch. The watch is a lot easier to get on and off than a wedding ring.
author: John Mayer

quote: A wedding, people decide to get married, it comes out of such love for one another and then women can turn into these other people. They're planning something that's the biggest event they'll ever plan in their lives and it turns them into this other person, so it's not totally the guy's fault that he's feeling disconnected from this person.
author: Alison Brie

quote: I love pizza. I want to marry it, but it would just be to eat her family at the wedding.
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: Wedding is destiny, and hanging likewise.
author: John Heywood

quote: You have to make your wedding day all about you.
author: DJ Jazzy Jeff

quote: For years my wedding ring has done its job. It has led me not into temptation. It has reminded my husband numerous times at parties that it's time to go home. It has been a source of relief to a dinner companion. It has been a status symbol in the maternity ward.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: So many people say you have to remember to grab hold of your bride or groom and spend time with them. I think if we had done a traditional wedding, we would have been doing it for everyone else, but this was about the two of us.
author: Katherine Kelly

quote: In marriage there are no manners to keep up, and beneath the wildest accusations no real criticism. Each is familiar with that ancient child in the other who may erupt again. We are not ridiculous to ourselves. We are ageless. That is the luxury of the wedding ring.
author: Enid Bagnold

quote: Falling in love was the easy part; planning a wedding - yikes!
author: Niecy Nash

quote: When I design a wedding dress with a bustle, it has to be one the bride can dance in. I love the idea that something is practical and still looks great.
author: Vera Wang

quote: That is ever the way. 'Tis all jealousy to the bride and good wishes to the corpse.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: It's a funny thing that when a man hasn't anything on earth to worry about, he goes off and gets married.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The most dangerous food is wedding cake.
author: James Thurber

quote: What the bride should do is call guests who have young children and say: 'I'd love to have the kids at the wedding, but we won't have room. Would you get a baby sitter, and when we get back from our honeymoon, we'll have you guys over?'
author: Letitia Baldrige

quote: As I grew up and began identifying myself as a feminist, there were plenty of issues that continued to make me question marriage: the father 'giving' the bride away, women taking their husband's last name, the white dress, the vows promising to 'obey' the groom. And that only covers the wedding.
author: Jessica Valenti

quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: O month when they who love must love and wed.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Fantasies can be great, but we shouldn't make the wedding a fantasy, because the wedding is the gateway to married life. It shouldn't be a moment of illusion; it should be a moment of preparation.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: My brother liked sewing and sculpting and making things, and my sister sewed and painted and cooked and baked. She's a professional baker now and makes the most gorgeous sculpture-like cakes. She's the queen of wedding cakes in the Lake Tahoe area.
author: John Lasseter

quote: Do I believe in coupling? Do I believe in commitment? Do I believe in co-parenting, raising children together, having a family, and growing old with someone? I absolutely believe in all of those things. I just don't believe that you need to be married to do that. I love going to weddings, though. I do love a good wedding.
author: Laura Wasser

quote: And we've got a toaster and everything. So there is no reason for the wedding.
author: Karl Pilkington

quote: A gloomy guest fits not a wedding feast.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The pilot is the wedding, and the series is the relationship.
author: Thomas Gibson

quote: Wedding fever is one of the scariest diseases I have ever seen.
author: Jessica Valenti

quote: I'm the person who will go to a wedding and switch the place cards around because I don't want to sit next to someone I don't know, because I'm so bad at chatting to strangers.
author: Sharon Horgan

quote: Music played at weddings always reminds me of the music played for soldiers before they go into battle.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: My favourite flowers are English country roses - I had a bouquet of them for my wedding.
author: Kate Moss

quote: About 80 percent of the photos on Flickr are public and searchable by everyone. In one sense, it's a place where people upload snapshots from the family reunion, wedding or the birth of a baby or something like that, but it's also a place where people go to show what the world looks like to them.
author: Stewart Butterfield

quote: All my tattoos except my first were not planned. I would just go into the shop late at night with friends and ask for something on the spot. My first is my parents' wedding date. I thought it would soften the blow of getting a tattoo.
author: Hailey Baldwin

quote: I get very nervous when I have to take my wedding ring off.
author: Jerry O'Connell

quote: I've been sober for two-and-a-half years, My children are happy. In August, my wife and I will celebrate our fifteenth wedding anniversary. My band is back together with a sold-out tour.
author: Trey Anastasio

quote: Jody Hill, who I created 'Eastbound And Down' and 'Fist Foot Way' with, was my best man at my wedding.
author: Danny McBride

quote: I am about to be married, and am of course in all the misery of a man in pursuit of happiness.
author: Lord Byron

quote: You know that scene in 'Runaway Bride' when Julia Roberts puts on the amazing wedding dress and looks at herself in the mirror and goes, 'Swish, swish'? I loved that moment so much when I was a little girl.
author: Lily James

quote: The vibe of my wedding is kind of going to be ethereal. Simple and modern, in a way, but with a lot of greenery. So, eucalyptus, olive branches, moss, and candles - it's going to be very... I want it to feel very comfortable, but obviously sleek.
author: Sasha Pieterse

quote: I believe the wedding vows are sacred and precious, and it's been one of my goals as a writer to portray the kind of marriages I've seen modeled in my family - my parents and grandparents, who all celebrated fifty-year anniversaries and well-beyond.
author: Deborah Raney

quote: I myself have never been enchanted by the dream of the white wedding, and, heaven help us, the expectation that this exquisitely catered event should be 'the happiest moment' of one's life.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: I did calligraphy for the invitations for, like, Robin Thicke and Paula Patton's wedding.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: I love dress shopping, and I love talking about the wedding food. That's what makes me happy. If you tell me to do a guest list, I cry. I hate it.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: Every wedding is slightly different from the other. But you always get to meet the funny uncle and the weirdo relatives, and there's always someone trying to beat you up for not playing enough Beatles songs or something.
author: Jens Lekman

quote: Of course, I do have a slight advantage over the rest of you. It helps in a pinch to be able to remind your bride that you gave up a throne for her.
author: Edward VIII

quote: I wore a $30 vintage wedding dress for my 8th birthday in an underground jazz club in Seattle. This was what I wanted.
author: Dove Cameron

quote: I love the royal family. I even got up in the middle of the night to watch Kate and William's wedding. And I never miss the Queen's speech on Christmas Day. I feel it's my duty as an English-born woman to watch.
author: Lily Collins

quote: Narciso Rodriguez was my first fashion big brother. He made my wedding dress, which was wonderful.
author: Claire Danes

quote: A lawyer I once knew told me of a strange case, a suffragette who had never married. After her death, he opened her trunk and discovered 50 wedding gowns.
author: Marguerite Young

quote: When I planned my wedding the first time, my ex-husband and I, we were both struggling comics. I had a TV show that had gotten cancelled. Basically, I rented a wedding gown; the reception hall smelled like feet.
author: Sherri Shepherd

quote: My mother and father had a terrible marriage. They celebrated their wedding anniversary one year with their friends. Why did they celebrate? Maybe because they had lasted so many years without killing each other.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: When I was a seminarian, I was dazzled by a girl I met at an uncle's wedding. I was surprised by her beauty, her intellectual brilliance... and, well, I was bowled over for quite a while.
author: Pope Francis

quote: I'd imagine my wedding as a fairy tale... huge, beautiful and white.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: On the night of the winter solstice, when the dead get their annual reprieve, they go up to the 24-hour donut shop and wedding chapel to get hitched. Marriage is a good and proper pursuit for dead people. For a while, it relieves the dark, shuddering loneliness of the afterlife.
author: Rachel Swirsky

quote: My mother says I didn't open my eyes for eight days after I was born, but when I did, the first thing I saw was an engagement ring. I was hooked.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: The first thing I did when I sold my book was buy a new wedding ring for my wife and asked her to marry me all over again.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: For me, life has either been a wake or a wedding.
author: Peter O'Toole

quote: In the Mexican culture, we never miss a baptism, a birthday, a baby shower, a wedding shower, a wedding. You must show up. Otherwise, you'll be in big trouble.
author: Eva Longoria

quote: The chain of wedlock is so heavy that it takes two to carry it - and sometimes three.
author: Heraclitus

quote: I always envisioned myself having a traditional and elegant wedding.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: I only wear two rings: a wedding ring and my World Series ring.
author: Joe Garagiola

quote: We were pretty good mates until the Beatles started to split up and Yoko came into it. It was more like old army buddies splitting up on account of wedding bells.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: I don't understand why you have to wear a wedding ring to warn people off. You should be able to be faithful to that person without anything on your body to show that you are with someone.
author: Sam Smith

quote: I did get to keep the wedding dresses from 'Runaway Bride'. They're all boxed up in my garage. I've never opened them. It'll be fun one day when Hazel is taller. She can play dress-up with her friends.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: I chose my wife, as she did her wedding gown, for qualities that would wear well.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: The trouble with wedlock is that there's not enough wed and too much lock.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: I love dress shopping, and I love talking about the wedding food. That's what makes me happy.
author: Christine Teigen

quote: I was a bridesmaid at a wedding in one picture.
author: Dorothy Malone

quote: I have great hopes that we shall love each other all our lives as much as if we had never married at all.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Jealousy, greed, fear. We're all full of these things. But also love and compassion. If you saw a drowning baby, it wouldn't matter if you were wearing a tuxedo on the way to your own wedding. You'd jump in to save him.
author: John McAfee

quote: A delicious smoothie is a really easy way of taking on lots of amazing skin boosting ingredients and was my first port of call every morning in the run-up to my wedding - I'll throw in frozen berries, banana, spinach, almond butter, almond milk, and oats for a quick breakfast quite often.
author: Ella Woodward

quote: I mean, I do wear a wedding ring and take it off when I shoot.
author: Henry Ian Cusick

quote: Ariel may look a lot like Barbie, and her adventure may be limited to romance and over with the wedding bells, but unlike, say, Cinderella or Sleeping Beauty, she's active, brave and determined, the heroine of her own life. She even rescues the prince. And that makes her a rare fish, indeed, in the world of preschool culture.
author: Katha Pollitt

quote: I wear my wedding ring. We talk about when we're going to get married again, which we hope is going to take place some time in this incredibly hectic calendar year.
author: Jim Lampley

quote: I've chosen my wedding ring large and heavy to continue forever. But exactly because of that all the time that Dave and I have an argument I feel it like handcuffs, and on anger time I throw it in a basket. Poor Dave, he bought me three wedding rings already!
author: Carmen Miranda

quote: I've been in a couple of weddings where the coolest people that were the most day before so mellow and then the day of the wedding freaking out.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: I love a black wedding dress.
author: Vera Wang

quote: I don't ever really feel that wearing my wedding ring is what determines me being married or not.
author: Jessica Simpson

quote: It's very nice to be asked to anybody's wedding. Particularly if it's the Prince of Wales. I learned a lot from it, which was to end early and get away. I suppose one would have to look back historically and see who other royals had at their weddings. Were there people at Queen Elizabeth's wedding who were common like myself?
author: Jools Holland

quote: She tells enough white lies to ice a wedding cake.
author: Margot Asquith

quote: Each youth betrays considerable anxiety about the wedding night ahead.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: Our dog died from licking our wedding picture.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: I wouldn't call myself 'into the DJ scene.' I have friends who are DJs, like James Murphy. I was really into the DJ scene at his wedding. But generally, I'm not at the clubs. I've never been to a rave.
author: Greta Gerwig

quote: When I decided to get married at 40, I couldn't find a dress with the modernity or sophistication I wanted. That's when I saw the opportunity for a wedding gown business.
author: Vera Wang

quote: I wanna stay an eternal girlfriend. I want to have my boyfriend's children, but I don't think we need a piece of paper to regulate the game, and we don't have to go through the whole stress of a wedding and suffering to throw a good party.
author: Shakira

quote: All the information you could want is constantly streaming at you like a runaway truck - books, newspaper stories, Web sites, apps, how-to videos, this article you're reading, even entire magazines devoted to single subjects like charcuterie or wedding cakes or pickles.
author: Mario Batali

quote: There's been a lot of wedding songs and proposals. It's cool because when they play it at weddings so, it means a lot to them. That's a big deal. They're always going to remember 'Head Over Boots' as played at their wedding.
author: Jon Pardi

quote: Wedding: the point at which a man stops toasting a woman and begins roasting her.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: I'm a jewelry girl. I became with friends with designer Irene Neuwirth a few years ago. At that point, I just used to wear my wedding rings. Very low key. Now, if I could, I'd be draped from head to toe in her jewelry all the time. Everything she makes is beautiful.
author: Busy Philipps

quote: If I do find myself walking up the aisle and dancing at my own wedding reception, I want the first dance to be both spontaneous and dramatic.
author: Anton du Beke

quote: At my wedding, I was dancing so furiously that I fell hard on my kneecaps. The next morning, my knees were so swollen that I had to get a wheelchair at the airport to go on my honeymoon.
author: Casey Wilson

quote: I was never the girl who tore pictures out of wedding magazines.
author: Camila Alves

quote: I never wanted a big wedding. I never wanted to wear a white dress or throw a bouquet.
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quote: If you're engaged more than a year, there's something up. There's lot of debate as to whether one should or shouldn't get married, but when you get engaged, it's a promise to get married, and if you don't just do it within a year, one of the parties is using the excuse of, like, 'I can't find the right venue' to put off the wedding.
author: Nicholas Stoller

quote: I like wearing my wedding ring, it's nice.
author: Jerry O'Connell

quote: I can wear a sexy dress to any red carpet event. My wedding is my chance to go all the way and wear a princess silhouette.
author: Roselyn Sanchez

quote: The day of the wedding went like these things generally do, full of anxious moments interspersed with black comedy.
author: Janet Street-Porter

quote: I'm not really that girl who dreams about her wedding day.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I hadn't been in Vegas 20 minutes when I got word that the bookmakers were offering three to one that Frank wouldn't show for my wedding.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: I sang 'All Of Me' at the wedding. I sang 'Stay With You' from my first album. And then Stevie Wonder came up and sang 'Ribbon In the Sky.' It was impromptu... It was cool... He's always been a friend and a mentor to me.
author: John Legend

quote: An invitation to a wedding invokes more trouble than a summons to a police court.
author: William Feather

quote: The Wedding March always reminds me of the music played when soldiers go into battle.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: I ate no butcher's meat, lived chiefly on fruits, vegetables, and fish, and never drank a glass of spirits or wine until my wedding day. To this I attribute my continual good health, endurance, and an iron constitution.
author: John James Audubon

quote: I learned hard lessons in life; I had to because I had so much happen: My mother died my sophomore year in high school. The next year, same day, my brother dropped dead. Two years after that, I got married because my girlfriend got pregnant. The year after my wedding, my father - who I had only recently met - died.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: I love 3-D. I have been a big fan of 3-D for a long, long time. I took my 1988 wedding pictures in 3-D!
author: John Lasseter

quote: There was no relationship between a wedding dress and fashion. There was no good taste, either. I realized that I could make an impression in terms of changing and readdressing the whole industry of bridal.
author: Vera Wang

quote: My father always wanted to be the corpse at every funeral, the bride at every wedding and the baby at every christening.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: When I had a job catering, I catered a wedding for the Smashing Pumpkins bassist in Indiana. And I served Billy Corgan shrimp off a tray.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: People's hands fascinate me. It's tempting to look at a businessman's left hand and see if there's an indentation from a missing wedding ring. Or maybe there's a tan line and the skin is pressed down where's he's worked a ring off his finger.
author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quote: I still love touring rock clubs around the world, and that's something that's really a part of me. I love making albums, and I'm a wedding singer on the side; that's my parallel career. So I love all those aspects of making music.
author: Jens Lekman

quote: The wedding took place in Vermont, where they have legalized gay civil unions, and I married a woman.
author: Craig Ferguson

quote: I love auditioning. Since 'The Notebook' and 'Wedding Crashers,' I don't have to audition anymore, and I miss it. You get to show your interpretation of the character. I get nervous when I don't audition. What if they hate what I want to do?
author: Rachel McAdams

quote: An embellished top with slim pants is great, even for a wedding.
author: Brad Goreski

quote: So many little girls dream about their wedding day. But with actresses, sometimes it's the inverse, because we get to be the centre of attention, looked up and down, dressed up for premieres all the time. The pull isn't quite as great.
author: Natalie Dormer

quote: When I auditioned for 'Wedding Crashers,' the producers had never seen any of my other work except for Bond. I got 'Wedding Crashers' partly because I was a Bond girl.
author: Jane Seymour

quote: I only did karaoke once in my life. It was with Courtney Love and it was a total disaster. She pulled me on stage in front of 500 people at a wedding. I'd never done karaoke before.
author: Jared Leto

quote: Somebody ripped their pants open at my wedding, dipping my mother. My mother is not a lady who throws herself into a dip that often, so I don't think he thought she was really going to do it.
author: Melissa McCarthy

quote: I wish I could wear 10 dresses to my wedding. It's so sad that you put it in storage and then never see it again. I am going to sleep in mine after I wear it.
author: Eva Longoria

quote: The Wedding March has a bit of a death march in it.
author: Brian May

quote: I feel as though my career really hit its high point when I was cast as a supporting actress in 'American Wedding'. I thought the script had a lot of depth and intelligence, and it really just jumped off the page.
author: January Jones

quote: I thought I was attractive when I shot 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding.' Studio executives and movie reviewers let me know I had a confidence in my looks that was not shared by them.
author: Nia Vardalos

quote: My wedding was a very private affair for close family and friends, so I had decided to hold a reception in my native town.
author: Mohit Chauhan

quote: In the '50s, a lot of girls never saw beyond the wedding day.
author: Helen Reddy

quote: As a child, as a cinemagoer, I think there is nothing better than being in a cinema or watching a film. I think it's just a while magical... it almost feels like you're at a big party in India, where you're singing, you're dancing, you're laughing, you're crying, you feel like you're at a wedding because our films invariably cover all emotions.
author: Karan Johar

quote: After I had the Caesarean, I was told I had really strong stomach muscles and so would heal very quickly. And I did. I was up walking about within three hours. Six days after having her, I was out shopping and shortly after that I made it to David Walliams' wedding.
author: Denise Van Outen

quote: I have a memory of my mother kneeling in front of a cabinet in our home, tenderly cradling her wedding china. We never used the plates; she died in her 40s without ever letting herself enjoy these gorgeous pieces. I told myself that I would use my precious items.
author: Roma Downey

quote: In 1966, I bought my parents a carriage clock for their silver wedding anniversary. It was last wound 30 years later, in December 1996, the month my father died.
author: Clive Sinclair

quote: When I celebrated my bar mitzvah, there was no cake. Today, there is no such thing as a bar mitzvah in the United States without a special cake. It can be even more complicated and expensive than a wedding cake, because bar-mitzvah cakes are often based on a particular theme.
author: Ron Ben-Israel

quote: I didn't finish my dress until about three days before my wedding - I had the flu and was stitching it from my bed. And the tulle came back from India all brown. We had to wash it for hours, but that didn't dissuade me from wearing it.
author: Georgina Chapman

quote: Well the wedding in the words of the Archbishop of Canterbury was a fairy tale and there was a huge public impress, investment of goodwill, affection and indeed money in this Institution. It was a huge success at the time.
author: Anthony Holden

quote: I was never a girl who dreamed about what her wedding day would be like, but I've always dreamed about decorating my baby's nursery.
author: Rebecca Romijn

quote: Where does it stop? You get offered money for your wedding, then for your kids, new houses, holidays... We earn enough from football and sponsorships, why do you need any more?
author: Ryan Giggs

quote: I think my first experience of art, or the joy in making art, was playing the horn at some high-school dance or bar mitzvah or wedding, looking at a roomful of people moving their bodies around in time to what I was doing. There was a piano player, a bass player, a drummer, and my breath making the melody.
author: Robert Pinsky

quote: It happened in Miami, in Coral Gables, a great big ol' Cuban wedding. It was pretty intense.
author: Jon Secada

quote: I'm one of those people who has always been a bridesmaid.
author: Piper Laurie

quote: When Andrew went with the girls, we were talking all morning and he was saying, 'It's okay. Just remember we had such a good day. Our wedding was so perfect.' Because we're such a unit together. He made me feel very part of the day on April the 29th.
author: Sarah Ferguson

quote: It has been the experience of a lifetime to work with Catherine Middleton to create her wedding dress, and I have enjoyed every moment of it. It was such an incredible honor to be asked, and I am so proud of what we and the Alexander McQueen team have created.
author: Sarah Burton

quote: I went looking for dresses and realized there was a niche I could fill in the wedding dress market.
author: Monique Lhuillier

quote: For her fifth wedding, the bride wore black and carried a scotch and soda.
author: Phyllis Battelle

quote: I've always been the type to fall in love fast and, with every boyfriend, I plan out my wedding in my head.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: I am the center of attention in my job every single day; the thought of a wedding to me is exhausting. Why would I put myself through that?
author: Lady Gaga

quote: I'll never have a wedding. I don't want to marry just to do what everybody else is doing.
author: Mr. T

quote: When the wedding march sounds the resolute approach, the clock no longer ticks, it tolls the hour. The figures in the aisle are no longer individuals, they symbolize the human race.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: You can give poor people this royal wedding to watch and make them feel good about themselves, or you can give them something useful like, I don't know... a toaster.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: There is no way in the world anyone else could do my wedding other than myself, along with whomever I select to do various things.
author: Aretha Franklin

quote: You may invite the entire 35th Division to your wedding if you want to. I guess it's going to be yours as well as mine. We might as well have the church full while we are at it.
author: Bess Truman

quote: I sang a song at my sister's wedding. My mother forced me into that, too. But that one felt all right.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: I think a lot of people who feel as though they desperately want to be married oftentimes simply desperately want to have a wedding.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: A woman seldom asks advice before she has bought her wedding clothes.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: I've always had a propensity for getting the cursive down pretty well. What it evolved into was my pseudo-waitressing job when I was auditioning. I didn't wait tables. I did calligraphy for the invitations for, like, Robin Thicke and Paula Patton's wedding.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: The press is just not your friend when it comes to a marriage. That's why we didn't sell the pictures of our wedding, and we got offered millions of dollars for them, millions.
author: Katy Perry

quote: Our whole wedding cost 180 bucks. Afterward, we re-heated lasagna for everyone and set off fireworks.
author: Larry the Cable Guy

quote: Personally, I'm an advocate for short engagements. Long sometimes means there is a reason for it. Two years engaged and no wedding... I'd be upset.
author: Emily Blunt

quote: I think that weddings have probably been crashed since the beginning of time. Cavemen crashed them. You go to meet girls. It makes sense.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I've never crashed a wedding. When I was a kid I, of course, used to crash parties. Crashing a wedding is difficult though because you have to have the suit, and you have to have information in case someone catches you. You have to know at least some names and something.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: The prenup needs to be drawn up months before the wedding, not days - it's not something you slap together and sign in the car on the way to the ceremony. A shotgun prenup might not hold up in court.
author: Suze Orman

quote: I've been looking at some video clips on YouTube of President Obama - then candidate Obama - going through Iowa making promises. The gap between his promises and his performance is the largest I've seen, well, since the Kardashian wedding and the promise of 'til death do we part.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: I was a wedding singer as a teenager.
author: John Legend

quote: I hated the royal wedding.
author: Morrissey

quote: I used to love to create outfits, and I still do - I just don't have the time. How can you wear one thing and never wear it again? Even my wedding dress - I had a dress made that I could wear again. I'm a child of the depression, so I'm very, very practical.
author: Iris Apfel

quote: I wanted to define the vocabulary of a wedding both visually and intellectually. The book is about more than weddings or wedding dresses. It's a metaphor for women's lives, their creativity.
author: Vera Wang

quote: Monica Seles: I'd hate to be next door to her on her wedding night.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: I always had boyfriends, but I never imagined a proposal or a wedding. To me, that was like having a ball and chain round your neck.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: I'm obsessed with Kate Middleton. Obsessed. I loved the Royal Wedding. I was so cynical going into it, and pseudo-political about the whole thing, but as soon as I saw her, I was utterly charmed. I'm just completely enchanted by Kate and William.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: Even if it's your wedding, if you're a guy, it's boring.
author: Blake Shelton

quote: I don't talk about my personal life in the press; that's how I kept my wedding a secret.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: I just wrapped this movie called 'The Wedding Crashers' which was a pretty big break for me.
author: Bradley Cooper

quote: My uncle was an Elvis impersonator - his name was Perry, and he went by 'Elvis Perry' - and my work as a wedding singer landed me a spot in his act.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: I had a huge Indian wedding, and I did it for my wife, and I did it for my white friends.
author: Hasan Minhaj

quote: It gave me a lot of pleasure and pride that 90 percent of the crew for 'Monsoon Wedding,' and most of my film, are women. We get the work done, you know, much lesser play of ego... And I really believe in harmony, I believe in working in a spirit of egolessness and that the film is bigger than all of us.
author: Mira Nair

quote: My family is almost exactly like the one in 'Monsoon Wedding'. We are very open, fairly liberal, loud people.
author: Mira Nair

quote: Women who marry early are often overly enamored of the kind of man who looks great in wedding pictures and passes the maid of honor his telephone number.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: When I got married, the Sun ran the headline: 'Here comes the bride, all fat and wide.' Luckily, it was a few days after the wedding - but it was still hideous to read at a great romantic moment.
author: Jo Brand

quote: I just wasn't one of those girls who dreamt of her wedding day and the birth of her first child.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: My father and mother were not that compatible. I don't think they had a good wedding night, and I was the product of that. We weren't close.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: Well, I'll tell you something, this wedding is something that I will always, always cherish. It was a show of love and support and kindness like I'd never seen from the people, and that's who I entertain. I entertain the people.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: Christmas carols always brought tears to my eyes. I also cry at weddings. I should have cried at a couple of my own.
author: Ethel Merman

quote: Everywhere I go, people ask me about Jennifer Aniston's wedding. Everywhere I go. I always say to her, I'm like, 'Being friends with you is a burden. You think it's hard to be friends with me?'
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: I want a big church wedding.
author: Sienna Miller

quote: When I got married, I hired a great choir - the St. James Choir, an all-black gospel choir - to sing at my wedding.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: We served Twinkies and Sno Balls at our wedding. We put them on silver trays so they looked elegant - but they were the real deal!
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: I am usually part of any disaster at a wedding if I'm a bridesmaid, which I've been lucky enough to be several times.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: I think if you're at the point where you're popular enough to sell your wedding photos to OK! Magazine then you don't need the money.
author: Johnny Vegas

quote: I'm old school. We're from a small town in Georgia, and I think if we do pictures before the wedding, I think I'm gonna be blindfolded.
author: Brantley Gilbert

quote: I think the only consistent thing is that I like projects that explore different social themes. 'Our Family Wedding' is a comedy, but it deals with two different cultures coming together. It's also about people letting go.
author: Forest Whitaker

quote: My biggest blast-off hit was 'You Raise Me Up.' If you ever have a wedding or a funeral, it's a good pick.
author: Josh Groban

quote: I don't really have many regrets. I did miss a lot of the events in the days leading up to my sister's wedding because I was at a U17 camp. There were moments like that growing up when I felt like I focused too much on soccer. But that's probably the reason I am where I am today.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: When widows exclaim loudly against second marriages, I would always lay a wager than the man, If not the wedding day, is absolutely fixed on.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: A big part of being in a wedding is the financial obligation, and that's something that people don't really talk about, but if you're asked to be in a wedding, you're gonna have to fork over some cash.
author: Kristen Wiig

quote: I met Prince William at a musical festival and he let me know he was a fan of my music. But the invitation to sing at his wedding reception came completely out of the blue. The fact that Kate and William knew the words to my songs was very touching.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: I'm definitely willing to film it for sure. I feel like I've taken people on this incredible journey on 'Total Divas' and 'Total Bellas.' They have seen me cry, get angry, and be so many different ways about marriage. I feel like for my fan base, my Bella Army, I should let them tune in to my wedding.
author: Nikki Bella

quote: I do not want my man to be exhausted for our wedding day, especially our wedding night.
author: Nikki Bella

quote: When I saw Kate Moss's champagne tower from her wedding, I was like, 'Okay, check - I want that. I want fireworks.'
author: Nikki Bella

quote: The best thing I ever bought is a vintage Oscar de la Renta short gingham dress that I wore to my rehearsal dinner the night before my wedding.
author: Kelly Wearstler

quote: If I felt, in the event of a royal wedding, inspired to write about people coming together in marriage or civil partnership, I would just be grateful to have an idea for the poem. And if I didn't, I'd ignore it.
author: Carol Ann Duffy

quote: I use filming as an excuse to take classes. I got my certification in sailing for 'Wedding Crashers,' and now I can handle a 26-foot boat. I played a seamstress once, so I took sewing classes. I love dipping into these other lives.
author: Rachel McAdams

quote: I'd want it to be really special to both of us, but I'm a huge fan of 'At Last' as a wedding song. But what's also really cool is songs that no one else would have at their wedding, like an obscure Radiohead song.
author: Mary Lambert

quote: 'Through sickness and through health' sounds so simple on your wedding day, but in reality, they become significant words that are a huge responsibility and show true character to navigate.
author: Yolanda Hadid

quote: I moved to the city in August of 1980, and someone I thought was a friend had an apartment in this wedding cake of a building, so I slept on her couch for a few days.
author: Holly Hunter

quote: People ask if my parents are hippies, but they're actually very conservative. A girl called Rebel sang at their wedding, and that's where my name came from.
author: Rebel Wilson

quote: You can't make a rule about it. The minute you make a rule, it's like putting your wedding pictures in 'In Style' magazine - you're divorced.
author: Frances McDormand

quote: It was never important for a wedding to be about anything other than me and my partner. A big celebration was never my cup of tea.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: I try to remember, as I hear about friends getting engaged, that it's not about the ring and it's not about the wedding. It's a grave thing, getting married. And it's easy to get swept up in the wrong things.
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: Hierarchical formulations died because their wedding cake levels posited a multiply fractured cosmos that does not match the Space Age revelation of a unified universe in which the earth is clearly in, rather than separated from, the heavens. Hierarchical representations do not reflect what either the world or we are like.
author: Eugene Kennedy

quote: If it were not for the presents, an elopement would be preferable.
author: George Ade

quote: After 'Muriel's Wedding,' I first went to America, and I was sent all these scripts about fat girls overcoming hurdles. Something in me knew not to go down that road, even if it was a good script.
author: Toni Collette

quote: I love doing comedy. Absolutely love it. After 'Wedding Crashers,' people suddenly realized that it was something I could do.
author: Jane Seymour

quote: It's interesting because a lot of my 16-year-old kids' friends know me from 'Wedding Crashers,' and not so much Bond. My kids have a good laugh. I was 20 then. The look I had then was the look that a lot of their friends are assuming now. They think it's cool. What goes around comes around.
author: Jane Seymour

quote: Seriously I suspected I was a good actor, though I didn't know it during 'Monsoon Wedding.' Now I realize the more I learn, the less I know about acting... and life.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: You can easily take photographs at a wedding - no one would question it. But funerals are different.
author: Martin Parr

quote: Sepia in particular tends to make everything look a bit romantic and almost sentimental, hence the fact that it remains such a popular choice for wedding photographs.
author: Martin Parr

quote: I met Jason on a charity walk in 2001, and we got married on a friend's boat in Panama two years later. It was the perfect wedding for two people who'd already been married and who weren't teenagers.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: My favorite time to dance is at, like, wedding receptions, when it's all ages and everyone seems to be having fun.
author: Neil Patrick Harris

quote: It is sweet that people want to know everything about my wedding, but they should also respect my privacy.
author: Divyanka Tripathi

quote: I am a celebrity, but I don't want people standing outside my wedding venue.
author: Divyanka Tripathi

quote: I think the biggest thing that I have to do is to remind people that poetry is there for us to turn to not only to remind us that we're not alone - for example, if we are grieving the loss of someone - but also to help us celebrate our joys. That's why so many people I know who've gotten married will have a poem read at the wedding.
author: Natasha Trethewey

quote: I grew up in a very small town, but it happened to be in western Massachusetts, where there were a lot of gay people. I remember my aunt going to a gay wedding when I was 11, and I thought it was the coolest thing.
author: Elizabeth Banks

quote: I don't want to write poems about the royal wedding. I would have to be moved by the event.
author: Derek Walcott

quote: I'd been a wedding singer through college, but after a few years of doing my best renditions of jazz standards to clinking glasses and the sound of forks on salad, I thought, 'Oh God, if this is all I do, I'll never be able to live with myself.'
author: Idina Menzel

quote: I hope that when I'm 80 years old, people will still be talking about my wedding.
author: Jennifer Hudson

quote: After 'Wedding Crashers' I was just surprised as to the lack of comedic female material there is. So I had to start working and getting stuff out there for myself.
author: Isla Fisher

quote: Recently, I was preparing to sing Springsteen's 'If I Should Fall Behind' for a wedding and was unable to get through it without tears. My wife handed me 'Love You Forever.' I read it. I cried. But that cry somehow cured me of crying while singing the song. Go figure.
author: Clyde Edgerton

quote: I spent so many years in terror of 'making it legal' because the expression rang all too true - the wedding ritual struck me as nothing but a flowery front for the fulfilment of countless, tedious contracts and obligations.
author: Lynn Coady

quote: Prop 8 did something that no other state in the history of this country has done. It took away the rights of people that already were legally affirmed. Imagine someone putting something on the ballot saying your wedding, your marriage is no longer valid.
author: Gavin Newsom

quote: I just went to a wedding of a friend of mine who happens to be gay. Because somebody doesn't think the way I do, doesn't mean that I can't care about them or can't love them.
author: John Kasich

quote: I love both real and fake jewelry. My kids make me necklaces, and I wear those, too. Every day, I wear my gold wedding band and the Cartier watch my husband gave me.
author: Aerin Lauder

quote: The wedding ring on my left hand was bought by my grandfather, Samuel Miliband, in Brussels in 1920. I never knew him, as he died when I was one. But his ring was kept by my aunt until it was placed on my finger by my wife Louise 32 years later.
author: David Miliband

quote: As a pastor, you get invited into the most poignant moments of people's lives. Whether it's a wedding or a funeral or a hospital visit, you get invited into the center of the event, whether or not you know the people.
author: Rob Bell

quote: I've worn a dress at my wedding. I've worn 6-inch Louboutins. I've got no fear and no shame.
author: A. J. McLean

quote: People always complain, 'you never invited me to your wedding', but I prefer casual weddings.
author: Sinead O'Connor

quote: I've been married before, but I've never had my dream wedding in Vegas. I wanted to do it there because it's casual, quick, not religious and, most of all, very romantic.
author: Sinead O'Connor

quote: Jo Sykes made these incredible leather jackets: the leather was like butter. I had one, but I lost it at a wedding in Ibiza. It was so sad; I've not been able to replace.
author: Poppy Delevingne

quote: I get offered: 'Here's a girl who's mad at another girl for having a wedding on the same day.' That'll be a big hit, but I don't want to do that.
author: Amy Heckerling

quote: I would absolutely, definitely never sell my wedding pictures to a magazine. I'd like it to be a special day, not a photo shoot. And once you've done that, your marriage becomes everybody else's business.
author: Katherine Jenkins

quote: I found out I was pregnant seven days after my wedding. I was on honeymoon with my family.
author: Bryce Dallas Howard

quote: Often, what makes my job so exciting is designing for the mother whose dream has been to wear one of my hats at her child's wedding. I feel as responsible for making her feel like a million dollars as I do for somebody in the public eye.
author: Philip Treacy

quote: Hats are the epitome of Englishness, and a royal wedding is the penultimate moment for a hat designer. I'm Irish, but I am a royalist and I believe in fantasy.
author: Philip Treacy

quote: I didn't go abroad until quite late. A friend drove us to Amalfi, Italy, for his sister's wedding when I was a teenager. It was exciting driving through Europe.
author: David Harewood

quote: I think when wedding dresses are talked about, every woman has a different set of factors in her mind of what it could be because they've been thinking about it possibly for such a long time.
author: Giles Deacon

quote: Something that I think extends to a lot of African cultures is that the line between performer and audience is blurry. My mom would lead the wedding song regularly, and she isn't a professional singer. Even as an audience member, you're expected to clap and sing the response to the lead.
author: Kelela

quote: I'd like to do 'My Best Friend's Wedding,' 'Pretty Woman,' Meg Ryan type stuff. Romantic comedies. I'd love to do some action stuff as well.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: I don't know nothing about no marriages or nothing. I ain't even never been to a wedding.
author: Mike Epps

quote: Come on, planning a wedding, let's be honest, it's not fun. It's not fun being in a wedding.
author: Wendi McLendon-Covey

quote: I wore one of my own designs on my wedding day.
author: Emilia Wickstead

quote: The first wedding dress I ever made was for myself. It was at a time when I had my business up and running, but it was still very early days, and I thought, 'This is my moment to do whatever I like.'
author: Emilia Wickstead

quote: My wedding dress was featured by 'Vogue' and 'American Town and Country,' and from there, people started to come to us because they had seen that dress.
author: Emilia Wickstead

quote: I used to work all the time, and now if there is a wedding, there's a concert, I'm there.
author: Petra Nemcova

quote: On the publicity tour of 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding,' I was asked over and over again, if, as the writer, I felt it was a fair depiction of real life to have someone of my er, below average looks, hook up with hottie John Corbett.
author: Nia Vardalos

quote: The white hot publicity that came from 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding' was appreciated but not sought, so I was happy to walk away from it and then write.
author: Nia Vardalos

quote: I was in a fertility situation publicly, so I disappeared. I was very satisfied just being to able to creatively express myself with writing. The white hot publicity that came from 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding' was appreciated but not sought, so I was happy to walk away from it and then write.
author: Nia Vardalos

quote: I thought I was attractive when I shot 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding.' Studio executives and movie reviewers let me know I had a confidence in my looks that was not shared by them. In other words, they labeled me with words like overweight, unattractive, unappealing.
author: Nia Vardalos

quote: I do not have a bride gene. I haven't been planning a wedding since I was 3. I never put a sheet on my head and pretended that it was a veil.
author: Niecy Nash

quote: When I got married in 1991, I had never been to a wedding, so I didn't know that my wedding was tacky. I didn't know that I was getting married in a quinceanera dress, because there was nobody there to cry over me and tell me I look like a fool.
author: Niecy Nash

quote: I don't want to be Carrie Bradshaw. I don't want the wedding to be bigger than Big. I'm just grateful to know that the first time I fell in love wasn't the last time.
author: Niecy Nash

quote: On my wedding day. I didn't want a natural, blushing-bride look - I had a full-on hairdo and red lips. I thought it would be disingenuous to do the whole virginal look, so even though I had the white dress, I had pink net underneath.
author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quote: Most kids don't get to go their parents' wedding.
author: Ken Livingstone

quote: Since the day Brahma created the world to this day, no one's ever been able to satisfy a wedding guest. They always find some opportunity or other to find fault and criticise. One who can't even afford a dry piece of bread at home becomes a lord at the wedding party.
author: Munshi Premchand

quote: I've already been married six times in my career as an actress - twice as Becky - so I think a wedding of my own might feel too much like work!
author: Katherine Kelly

quote: I love going to other people's weddings, but I have never desired a big white wedding for myself, and it has never been put on me as a pressure, an expectation.
author: Katherine Kelly

quote: You can have a wedding at Fenway Park.
author: Mike Barnicle

quote: I am happy. I have a wonderful marriage. I was in a not-great second marriage for 20 years, then I fell in love with Steve, my first husband, again, and we remarried. I wore the dress from our first wedding in 1982 - it was tight, but I could get into it.
author: Marie Osmond

quote: We always talk about how the first several seasons were faithful to the books, and anybody who wanted to could go onto Wikipedia and learn Ned Stark gets beheaded or about The Red Wedding, and most people don't want to know - because why ruin a story?
author: David Benioff

quote: I'm used to being in front of camera and knowing what to think. But if you're asking me to be me, I get very self-conscious. My job isn't to be me. Being an actor, people think you can do a eulogy at a funeral, a speech at a wedding. I find all that very nerve-racking.
author: Eddie Marsan

quote: Neil Gaiman is a star. He constructs stories like some demented cook might make a wedding cake, building layer upon layer, including all kinds of sweet and sour in the mix.
author: Clive Barker

quote: For my first wedding, I cried all the way down the aisle. My fake eyelash came off. My nose was red. My eyes were swollen. I'm not one of those pretty criers.
author: Sherri Shepherd

quote: One of the great things about being a writer/journalist is that my boss loves me to go out and do features on being someone else. I did a feature on Kate Middleton, where I went to an incredible fancy state home in the countryside, put on a wedding dress and posed for engagement pictures with a fake Prince William.
author: Caitlin Moran

quote: Just because marriage didn't work for us doesn't mean we don't believe in the institution. Just because our own marital track records are mixed doesn't mean our hearts don't lift at the sight of our daughters' Tiffany-blue wedding invitations.
author: Sandra Tsing Loh

quote: I don't want a huge wedding. I don't want it to be some huge spectacle.
author: Kristin Cavallari

quote: I saw a photograph of a wedding conducted by Reverend Moon of the Unification Church. I wanted to understand this event, and the only way to understand it was to write about it.
author: Don DeLillo

quote: Valentino made my day suit for the wedding of Paloma Picasso in Paris.
author: Andre Leon Talley

quote: It's always great to have things from France at a wedding. It's symbolic of style, of culture, of taste.
author: Andre Leon Talley

quote: I love Spanish cities, particularly Barcelona, Madrid and Palma, which has the most amazing cathedral that I once went to for a wedding.
author: Louise Nurding

quote: Growing up, I was never the kind of girl to dream about wedding dresses and pretty houses.
author: Louise Nurding

quote: For a girl, the wedding is when you're married. For a guy, it's when you get engaged. It takes a real aggressive human being to back out between the ring and the wedding.
author: Max Greenfield

quote: When I was in high school, there was 'Superbad' and 'The Girl Next Door' and 'Wedding Crashers' and all these great movies. You hope to be a part of something that's smart, funny and in that Todd Phillips-vein. You want to make something like 'Superbad.' That movie was so good and so funny.
author: Miles Teller

quote: The only time I ever look good dancing is if I'm next to my dad at a wedding.
author: Cat Deeley

quote: Whenever I went to a wedding or a party, girls kept complaining about their shoes. I love to dance, and I wanted them to have shoes they could keep on all night.
author: Edgardo Osorio

quote: I saw a photo of a Christian Lacroix couture dress when I was in my teens and decided right then that that's how I wanted to look on my wedding day. In my mind, that's what angels looked like.
author: Margherita Missoni

quote: I loved everything about my wedding look, but, in retrospect, I would have changed the position of where we attached the veil on my head. Make sure you test a few different placements and styles before the big day to make a clear vision and plan with your hairstylist.
author: Margherita Missoni

quote: A person's character is but half formed till after wedlock.
author: Charles Simmons

quote: I don't think it's possible to have a wedding without it being stressful!
author: Debra Messing

quote: About my love life, I would like to say I am single till I have a ring on the right finger and a wedding date.
author: Krystle D'Souza

quote: In my head, at least, the business of spinning stories has no closing time. Twists in my characters' lives, glimpses of their secrets, obstacles to their dreams... all arrive unbidden when I'm getting cash at the ATM, walking my son to camp, singing a hymn at a wedding.
author: Julia Glass

quote: Growing up, I had one very specific idea of what a wedding should be, and that was the wedding of Fraulein Maria and Captain von Trapp in 'The Sound of Music.'
author: Ellie Kemper

quote: If you're going to plan a wedding, then a certain amount of suffering is not a choice.
author: Ellie Kemper

quote: Growing up, I had one very specific idea of what a wedding should be, and that was the wedding of Fraeulein Maria and Captain von Trapp in 'The Sound of Music.'
author: Ellie Kemper

quote: It took two months from the day my fiance proposed to my first Google search for 'wedding planning: how?' Now, let me interrupt myself here and share how much I hate using the word 'fiance.' It's so fancy, and it's hard not to sound like a jerk saying it. Which is why I will be using my own word for fiance: gloob.
author: Ellie Kemper

quote: I am fully anticipating that something - perhaps many things - will not go according to plan on our actual wedding day. If some of the flowers are wilted, or there aren't enough vegetarian meals, or the priest calls me the wrong name, I will embrace these errors.
author: Ellie Kemper

quote: Onassis told me. He begged me to come to the wedding.
author: Lee Radziwill

quote: I wasn't always overweight. I was a skinny little punk of a kid with severe asthma. When I got married at the age of 22, I wore a cut-down size eight wedding gown.
author: Mary Kay Andrews

quote: I had a Hebraic wedding in New York, so I'm definitely Jewish.
author: Amar'e Stoudemire

quote: Whenever I get married, it will be a Bengali wedding. If I won't have a Bengali wedding, my mother won't come. She has warned me. So, I am going to have a Bengali wedding for sure.
author: Bipasha Basu

quote: My wedding won't be a hush-hush affair. When I get married, everyone will get to know about it... there'll be nothing speculative about my wedding.
author: Bipasha Basu

quote: Quarrels often arise in marriages when the bridal gifts are excessive.
author: Antisthenes

quote: My problem with the wedding industry started when I studied in college and liked to have the television on in the background, and 'A Wedding Story' on TLC always came on, and I'd get irritated that the story of two people making a lifelong commitment to each other could be encapsulated in a half-hour show about the party they throw.
author: Jessica Valenti

quote: Not everyone can be successful selling fashion at $25,000 for a wedding outfit. Certain designers are able to do that. And there is only a certain amount of consumers who can do that. The real opportunity is in that $25 garment.
author: Imran Amed

quote: I had a 2-week courtship with a fellow student in the fiction workshop in Iowa and a 5-minute wedding in a lawyer's office above the coffee shop where we'd been having lunch that day. And so I sent a cable to my father saying, 'By the time you get this, Daddy, I'll already be Mrs. Blaise!'
author: Bharati Mukherjee

quote: I'm really close to my family, and I really want one of my own. But the wedding, it's not necessary for me.
author: Julia Restoin Roitfeld

quote: I use Pinterest for everything. Book collections, trips, hobbies. It's all there. I planned my wedding on it. When I had a kid, I planned all his stuff on it. So it was nice to discover that I wasn't the only one.
author: Ben Silbermann

quote: A wedding is such a girl thing.
author: Selma Blair

quote: I haven't made many wedding dresses. It's a dress very, very important for the girl; it's important to know the person, I believe, but at the same time it should be a shock to the person - the person should be shocked to be suddenly revealed. That's the work of a designer sometimes, to propose an ID of look.
author: Olivier Theyskens

quote: We all went to Kelsey's wedding, and yeah, we go to parties. We also go to each other's house. A group of us got together over at Kelsey's and just read through some plays just for the fun of it. That may not be everyone's idea of a good time, but we had a good time.
author: David Hyde Pierce

quote: One of the most common reasons people renovate their homes is a change in their lifestyle - an upcoming wedding, a new baby, or grown children moving away.
author: Candice Olson

quote: I really did put up all my wedding pictures on my website. And I swear to you, my wedding pictures got downloaded just as much as my bikini pictures.
author: Cindy Margolis

quote: What an electric thrill it sends up and down the spine, how it sets the heart racing: A Royal Romance! A Royal Wedding! The pomp and the pageantry!
author: Hamish Bowles

quote: I would like to sing for the Pope. And the Queen, and at Simon Cowell's wedding.
author: Jackie Evancho

quote: One time when somebody showed up in a wedding dress, but I never knew if it was a joke, or she was serious. She asked me to marry her. She was serious. It was pretty funny.
author: Bryan White

quote: It was about 2012, 2013. I started from zero. Small fashion shows, small photoshoots. I've seen a lot. I've seen a lot of things up close. I married my sister off; I gave jahez for her wedding. I tried to keep relations going with my family. I bought a house for them in Multan. My parents are settled in Multan; my house is there.
author: Qandeel Baloch

quote: I had all kinds of fantasies, like a lot of girls, but did I actually go through the motions of planning a wedding and buying bridal magazines and imagining things and setting up who would play what role? No. Because as I grew up, I started to believe that I would be one of those gals that never got married.
author: Sara Ramirez

quote: The Queen's wedding dress in 1947, there was some embroidery on the train which was definitely there to illustrate new dawn/post-war optimism, that sort of thing.
author: Kate Reardon

quote: Your wedding is your red carpet moment, and while brides definitely can take some chances with style, you don't want to look like a fad.
author: Reem Acra

quote: I don't follow trends. I make each cake for a particular wedding, or event.
author: Ron Ben-Israel

quote: I have a crusade against fondant, also shortening. There's no reason why wedding cakes can't taste good if you know what you're doing.
author: Ron Ben-Israel

quote: When planning your wedding you make so many decisions: 'Do I want this fork or that fork?' But in the end people aren't going to remember what napkin holder you choose.
author: Lara Stone

quote: I'm still waiting for someone to call me to cater their wedding. But that's gonna cost you. If you want my cousin Jerez to play the sax, that's going to cost you a little more. The sky's the limit after that.
author: Coolio

quote: I felt very unstressed on my wedding day. I'm very grateful for that... spending the day on my own, being super quiet and happy and just puttering around doing my own thing.
author: Sonya Walger

quote: No wedding bells for me anymore. I've been happily married to my profession for years.
author: Shirley Bassey

quote: My wedding was at home, so I didn't really want to wear a veil in my house. Instead I wore a lot of diamond hair clips. They were brooches, actually, designed by Lorraine Schwartz.
author: Georgina Chapman

quote: My friends asked me to be a reverend at their wedding in France a few years ago. I went on the Internet, and within 15 seconds, I was printing out a certificate which allowed me to officiate at their wedding.
author: Lucy Punch

quote: I can see why people love the idea of a big white wedding - it is a day when they are the centre of attention and get to wear a beautiful dress. But that sounds awful to me because that is like getting ready to walk down the red carpet.
author: Lucy Punch

quote: When I was little, I watched a lot of Disney movies - so I always imagined a big fairytale wedding as a kid. But when marriage became real, I felt an intimate wedding with close family and friends would be better.
author: Hazel Keech

quote: Sure, men like a challenge - but so do women. And nobody likes to be challenged all the time. I know plenty of long-standing happy couples who slept together right away, spent hours yakking on the phone, split checks down the middle, and lived together for years before the wedding.
author: Katha Pollitt

quote: I believe that anybody who gets married should go to a counselor for months before the wedding. I think that's going to save guys a lot of money and the ladies a lot of heartbreak.
author: James Brolin

quote: There's no scenario in which I wouldn't want my entire family at a wedding.
author: Jordan Rodgers

quote: Let's say you go to a friend's wedding, or Thanksgiving, or Halloween. It'd be great the next day to see what went on with your friends' Thanksgiving weekend, or all the costumes they wore on Halloween, and be able to look back and see what they wore the year before, and the year before that.
author: Mike McCue

quote: I worked a lot with Nick Knight and John Galliano when John was at Dior. He also made my wedding dress. He'll always hold a special place; I have most of my memorable, iconic moments in fashion with him.
author: Liberty Ross

quote: Me and the Dap-Kings, the whole band is playing a wedding band in 'The Wolf of Wall Street.'
author: Sharon Jones

quote: I want the big drama. I always said I don't want a wedding I want a parade.
author: Star Jones

quote: Recently, I was in Bernalda, my dad's ancestral home town in Italy. He has just refurbished a palazzo and turned it into a hotel, so we had my sister's wedding there. It was beautiful.
author: Roman Coppola

quote: I really was about to pass out during my entire wedding. I just didn't know if I could marry anybody.
author: Patricia Richardson

quote: A walk through the storage facility of the community museum where I worked might easily have convinced you that people in the past wore only wedding dresses, carried silver candlesticks, and played with porcelain dolls.
author: Susanna Kearsley

quote: People didn't just wear wedding dresses in the past. They also wore plain cotton shifts beneath them. As pretty as the dresses might be, and as lovely as they might look on display, if a museum doesn't hang the shifts beside them or acknowledge that the shifts existed, that exhibit's incomplete.
author: Susanna Kearsley

quote: Saw a wedding in the church. It was strange to see what delight we married people have to see these poor fools decoyed into our condition.
author: Samuel Pepys

quote: On my wedding day, I gifted my wife a platinum ring.
author: Vijender Singh

quote: It was only literally hours after the wedding when he felt he didn't have to keep up the facade.
author: Trisha Goddard

quote: I try to study the background of the country I am in and what were my hits there, so I can at least give them some of what they want. It's like a wedding - give them something old, something new, something borrowed and definitely something blue!
author: Betty Wright

quote: I met Kanye. I'm starstruck, man, but I stayed away from that guy. I didn't want him to go on a rant, go off on me. He did it at his wedding.
author: Jay Pharoah

quote: My husband and I click wedding rings sometimes and say, 'By the power of the Castle of Greyskull!'
author: Tamora Pierce

quote: 'That's What She Said' is not Hollywood's standard picture of women: preternaturally gorgeous, wedding obsessed, boy crazy, fashion focused, sexed up 'girl' women. These are real women, comically portrayed, who are trying to wrestle with the very expectations of womanhood that Hollywood movies set up.
author: Carrie Preston

quote: I got my first big paycheck for 'My Best Friend's Wedding.' This was in the days when you actually did get paid to have a supporting role. It just doesn't happen like that anymore, but this was in the '90s. It was the golden age!
author: Carrie Preston

quote: I want John Legend to sing at my wedding.
author: Sloane Stephens

quote: My husband, Jim, converted to Judaism just before our wedding.
author: Anita Diament

quote: When he came back from downtown, he had forgotten to bring his license, his identification, the $2 for the wedding license. So we got married two days later.
author: Eydie Gorme

quote: I'll get pretty much everything the way I want it. I've always dreamed of a beach wedding.
author: Nicole Appleton

quote: Well... Actually I got picked because I was the only one who fit the wedding gown - they had my size.
author: Kevin McDonald

quote: The first thing I ever saw Bradley Cooper in was 'Wedding Crashers.'
author: Ed Weeks

quote: That to me was the most poignant part of Diana's wedding; as she was walking up the aisle and her eyes were going left to right, looking at people and smiling in the way that Diana did - and that diamond tiara glittering like mad. It was great.
author: Bruce Oldfield

quote: I'd hesitated to have a wedding because my gay and lesbian friends don't have that right.
author: Kathy Najimy

quote: I love rings, but I can't wear them. I mean, look at my knuckles. My fingers and joints are so swollen from years of playing. That means no wedding band, either. Luckily, I have a very understanding wife.
author: Justin Tuck

quote: If you write a song, and you go into a restaurant, and there's a guy with a piano singing and he's playing piano, singing your song, or you hear it at a wedding or at an airport... it's fun!
author: Jesse Harris

quote: I loved 'Monsoon Wedding' and 'Lunchbox' because they had 'real' stories. I wish there are more films made like them.
author: Garth Davis

quote: The one thing that I'm in charge of in this wedding is the food.
author: Rob Mariano

quote: I usually have a few coins in my pocket when I'm playing, but the one I use to mark my ball on the green is a special silver coin that my wife designed for me. It has our wedding date inscribed on it.
author: Louis Oosthuizen

quote: Ever since I was a little girl, I wanted Valentino to design my wedding dress. Valentino is the definition of timeless elegance. I don't think there's another couture house like it.
author: Nicky Hilton

quote: I was the official wedding photographer at one of my best friends' weddings. Fortunately she was one of the most easygoing brides ever, so she made it easy for me.
author: Natalie Coughlin

quote: The most important item on my desk is a picture of my husband and three kids making kooky faces at my niece's wedding. We all look silly and happy.
author: Shira Goodman

quote: The most terrifying thing in the world was having to give a speech at my girlfriend's wedding. I was physically shaking and sweating the entire time.
author: Lindy Booth

quote: The Hiltons know how to put on a good wedding, that's all I can say.
author: Conrad Sewell

quote: My sister, singer Jessie Ware, and I are always exchanging music. We brainstormed her wedding playlist for months.
author: Hannah Ware

quote: Neither my fiance nor I take ourselves too seriously, and we want our wedding to reflect our lightheartedness.
author: Leah Pipes

quote: All weddings, except those with shotguns in evidence, are wonderful.
author: Liz Smith

quote: I see an insidious problem in the marketing of weddings as 'the happiest day of your life.' The pressure that is placed upon this event to be the alpha and omega of your entire existence makes it, I think, into a kind of nuptial New Year's Eve, and we all know how that usually turns out.
author: Jessi Klein

quote: If you had asked me when I was 28 and in my wedding dress if I ever thought I would end up in my forties flipping my husband the bird over potato chips, I'd say you were crazy.
author: Jenna McCarthy

quote: It's not that I think weddings - or marriages - are letdowns. It's just that I want to see my wedding as one awesome achievement on a continuum of achievements, all of which were, in their way, just as beautiful and profound for having led me to the current one.
author: Jessi Klein

quote: There was a thing on Facebook that said, 'Describe George Clooney's wedding in three words,' and my answer was, 'Not invited again.'
author: Michael O'Keefe

quote: No jealousy their dawn of love overcast, nor blasted were their wedded days with strife; each season looked delightful as it past, to the fond husband and the faithful wife.
author: James Beattie

quote: We are all so close. We are godfather to each others' kids. I was the best man at Jesus' wedding.
author: Juan Marichal

quote: It's important to still look like yourself on your wedding day, so I didn't do anything drastic.
author: Lily Aldridge

quote: A lot of people think I'm that guy in 'Betsy's Wedding', but I'm not. What it is for me is that, on some level, I connect with the character emotionally.
author: Anthony LaPaglia

quote: I tried writing this book about a singer in a wedding band, but realized I only wanted to write the book so I could have an excuse to sing with a wedding band as research. That's not a good enough reason to write a book.
author: Megan McCafferty

quote: Sometimes, my books start with a scene I see in my mind, such as a woman in a wedding dress running away from her wedding like in 'Embers of Love.' Sometimes, a book can start with a character.
author: Tracie Peterson

quote: I admire Eudora Welty. 'Delta Wedding' is a book I've given as a present to numerous women. Eudora Welty rocks. She writes such jewel-like, fine, refined short stories.
author: Nell Zink

quote: I can't tell you how lucky I feel. I've gotten to work Peter Facinelli 'American Odyssey,' and I got to do 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2' - which really gave me such a tremendous amount of pride and patriotism, and it was very close to my heart. I've really had such great support, so many great teachers, and so many wonderful people surrounding me.
author: Elena Kampouris

quote: I've thought about it a hundred times. I even buy bridal magazines sometimes. I want David Tutera to do my wedding.
author: Marlen Esparza

quote: The proposal is the only thing that the guy has control over in the entire wedding deal. It is your one chance to make this moment stand out, not only for you, but for her.
author: Drew Seeley

quote: I myself was a wedding photographer when I was, like, 16.
author: Kacy Hill

quote: I'm taking one thing at a time. With the children and launching my solo career it would drive me to a nervous breakdown if I tried to organise a wedding on top of that.
author: Natasha Hamilton

quote: For most couples, the first event they plan together is their wedding.
author: Lenny Platt

quote: My grandfather Frank Lloyd Wright wore a red sash on his wedding night. That is glamour!
author: Anne Baxter

quote: I have three older brothers, and we all have different combinations of parents. My father was the best man at my mom's first wedding! And my brother's mother - my dad's first wife - is the sister to my mom's first husband's second wife. So my brothers are both stepcousins and stepbrothers. It's very '70s rock.
author: Inara George

quote: We rent one in three tuxedos in the U.S. and Canada, and if we make a mistake, our employees will deliver to the customer's home, office, or wedding. We get a couple hundred letters a week praising the service in our stores.
author: George Zimmer

quote: My sister really drooled a lot when she was younger. For her wedding, I was going to get her one of those lace drool cups that go around the ears.
author: Cheri Oteri

quote: My five best friends, who were my bridesmaids in my wedding, are still my best friends.
author: Jill Kargman

quote: We had already planned my wedding when my brother passed away in 2012. When you're grieving, you don't necessarily want to think about something like that, but my brother told me that he wanted me to, so we went ahead and did it.
author: Yaya DaCosta

quote: Now in India, a village boy who has worked his way up to work at a call center, or if he gets a job working even as a busboy in a Taj or an Oberoi hotel, he'll put on his wedding announcement with pride, 'Busboy at the Taj' or 'Call center, Office Tiger.'
author: Marie Brenner

quote: Granddad offered me one hundred dollars if I would cut my mop of curly hair into a neat military style. Just before the wedding, I got a light trim. It wasn't enough for Granddad, and he didn't pay.
author: David Eisenhower

quote: Those are the men who will dance at your wedding.
author: Guy Madison

quote: Wedding rings need to be sparkly to remind us not to have sex with other people.
author: Andrea Savage

quote: Never get married in the morning - you never know who you might meet that night.
author: Paul Hornung

quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A wedding dress is both an intimate and personal for a woman - it must reflect the personality and style of the bride.
author: Carolina Herrera

quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
